text: Mr. Prakash has been an exceptional chemistry tutor for my son over the past two years. He is dedicated, communicative, and provided updates on my son’s progress, highlighting both areas of improvement and achievements. His passion for teaching and personalised approach helped build confidence and improve my son’s understanding of the subject significantly. We are grateful for his support. Highly recommended!

I'm thrilled to share my exceptional experience with Mr Prakash who tutored my son in IB Chemistry since Year 5.

As a parent, it's heartening to see my son gain confidence and excel in a challenging subject. Mr Prakash played a significant role in my child's success, expert guidance, and unwavering support.

What impressed me most was Mr Prakash's dedication, patience, and passion for teaching. He created a nurturing environment that encouraged my child to ask questions, explore concepts, and develop a genuine interest in Chemistry.

If you're seeking a reliable, knowledgeable, and caring tutor for your child, I highly recommend Mr Prakash.

Mr Prakash's knowledge of IB Chemistry syllabus is exceptional. He is able to transfer this knowledge effectively to his students through conducting small group classes and being flexible to students needs and learning pace. As a result, my child has achieved an excellent result for IB Chemistry. If you are looking for IB Chemistry tuition, I would highly recommend Mr Prakash.

Mr Prakash started coaching my girl's chemistry in her year 6. My girl results improved greatly from a fail papers in school to a score of 6 during her IB exam. We are very grateful for his selfless and kindness coaching.
Also, he will buy treats for his students in class and his classroom will always fill up with tibits and drinks. This created a less stressful tution environment and increased the bonding between teacher and students. My girl has good memories at his tution centre even she had graduated.  Thank you Mr Prakash:))

Mr Prakash was my child’s chemistry tutor from year 3 to year 6 . She benefitted greatly from his lessons and her grades improved tremendously. She enjoyed his style of teaching too. Chemistry became one of her best performing subjects .  Thank you Mr Prakash.
